content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite satisfactory. So, let's discuss the price. What would you consider a fair rent for this place?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euro per month would be a fair price for the apartment. It's in the city center after all.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for something closer to 700 Euro per month. What do you think about that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. Let's meet in the middle. How about 600 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hmm, 600 Euro is still not what I'm looking for. I think 650 Euro would be a more reasonable compromise. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think 650 Euro is too high for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but as the landlord, I must ensure the rent reflects the value of the apartment. If you're not comfortable with 650 Euro, I'm afraid we may not be able to reach an agreement. Would you like to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 600 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
